text: A Balasubramanian (left), CEO, Birla Sun Life Asset Management, handing over cheques worth Rs. 15 lakh to Aruna Subramaniam (second from left) of Bhoomika Trust at the start of the ‘Mumbai for Chennai’ concert series, an initiative by The Hindu Group to raise funds for the victims of the recent Chennai floods, in Mumbai on Friday. Namita Vikas (centre), group president & country head, responsible banking, Yes Bank, and singer Aruna Sairam are present.— Photo: Paul Noronha
title: Mumbai gives for Chennai
